meaning: accompany, obey, submit to, comply, follow, secondary, incidental, subordinate

onyomiExamples.meaning: having presence of mind, imperturbable, calm and self-possessed, with serenity
lesser (of equal court ranks), lower, junior

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to obey (an order, law, etc.), to abide by (a rule, custom, etc.), to follow, to observe, to conform to, to yield to, to follow (a person), to accompany, to go with, to go alongside (e.g. a river), to follow (e.g. a sign), to serve (as), to engage in (work)
to be accompanied by, to be attended by, to take along (someone), to conquer, to subjugate, to subdue
